message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $150 would be a fair price for both of us. I hope you can consider this offer.
